The employees treat everyone with the utmost hospitality, especially the guy who works up front with glasses and long hair, he is always so helpful and incredibly friendly! To anyone looking for a great place to play games, this is the place to be!
The Meeple is a great place to hang out with friends and play games like Commander and other games, the staff is fun and very helpfull and nice

I have shopped here alot recently because of the good selection of singles, but the issue is how I'm treated by the employees. A guy with long hair and glasses acts like new customers are unintelligent and treats them badly. I asked about store credit on cards out of pack and he called them lightly played, whenever they were fresh from a pack, and near mint wasn't a category. I shouldn't be treated like some casual because I'm new to the shop. Most of the staff is very nice but there are 2 employees who are very rude. Every time I come here I have more negative things to say than positive, because of a few bad apples. 80% of the employees are awesome but it's the ones I run in to regularly that are very discriminatory and try to gouge the customer. I also play a certain family of magic and the clerk talked down about it and tried to tell me I was wasting my time when what I play is what I WANT TO PLAY!! Instead of putting down my interest and trying to short me on trade ins they should be boosting the community and embracing it. Honestly I will never be shopping here again after this.
Great gaming store with good stock and prices
Great local gaming shop.  Lots of games to try out in the demo rack!
Extensive stock of a lot of different games...all levels!
A great place to play, huge playspace, great employees, great environment. The place is always clean, Dave is a great guy, and I always look forward to my days there!
Friendly staff, good selection of games, and they have a huge first come first serve area in the back to play games at (sometimes it reserved, I think for magic tournaments)
The play area is huge, and the selection is great.

Absolutely the worst game store experience I've ever had in my life.  I asked if I could buy a product, and they had to ask the event manager (as it would have been an exception to a rule).  I'd have been OK with a no, but I am not okay with being looked up and down and then getting a no (that was passed along to me rather than  directly).

Obviously, different experiences can occur, but for my dime, I won't be back.

Mighty Meeple has a great selection of tcg, ttrpgs, miniatures, and dice. The one thing I will criticize is the employee uniforms. I hope they ditch em and let the employees wear lax clothing like every other Board game store.Edit: weird opinion— but I am a very anti uniform person.

If you need any contemporary board games or AD&D guides or dice, this is a good place to go.  They have plenty of shelves with stock to look at and you can easily access the boxes to read up on the game.  They have gaming space in the back too.
Nice, clean store.
Great hobby shop with a focus on TCG’s.  Owner helped with an issue and made the experience enjoyable.  Plan of going back for more tournaments!!!

This is an excellent game store that caters to multiple niches. Not only does it have Magic the Gathering and D&D books, it has plenty of boards games and other specialized roleplaying games to choose from as well.
awesome place.  Employees and other players alike are super friendly and most events have plenty of people to fire.  10/10

Much bigger than I expected! Lots of games to browse, huge dice selection ranging from low cost to high end. Lots of supplies for tabletop RPG like figurines and environment.

Prices seem fair. I appreciated the unboxed games displayed at the front. Staff was mostly friendly, particularly the person at the register when checking out.
What a great store!! Huge selection of games and stuff, well presented, very friendly an helpful staff. And what I never experienced in any board game store before: they have a Bar and sell beer 🍺 👍

The Meeple is an exceptional LGS in every regard. They have definitely earned the “featured LGS” designation on the WoTC website. The shop is nicely sized, well stocked, impeccably clean and bright, and the play space is awesome. The staff are approachable, knowledgeable, and helpful. As someone newer to MTG it has been really hard to find a welcoming and accessible shop to play at and meet new players. The Meeple team works hard to make people comfortable, help them improve their game, and help them meet new players. The staff pitch play nights and get excited when you show up- they even walked me around and introduced me to some regular players my first game night to help me find a pod and get started. They also have a LOT of inventory. Whatever I need is typically in stock. Are the singles/prices higher than online? Yes. But I happily pay a bit more (typically ~10% more than the lowest TCG Player price) in exchange for all of the additional value we get from the shop. Some reviews about the shop being discriminatory or exclusive surprised me - as a regular shopper and new weekly Commander player, I always see a very diverse player population and the staff are very welcoming. Don’t give up on the local play groups! Try the Meeple!
Love it, I'm from a board gaming family and this place is paradise!
The place is always clean, usually pretty stocked with products and snack, and the employees are approachable.

First time coming in today and AMAZING customer service. Only complaint is wishing the stock consisted of more anime CCG such as Naruto Bundai CCG. Other than that, prices are good, customer service was fantastic. Ended up buying a small MHA TCG Box and left with the biggest smile on my face. Will definitely be back soon!!!
Great, friendly staff and board/card game products. I haven't been to a game night there yet but word of mouth has highly recommended it for Magic the Gathering.

I love The Mighty Meeple, its always been my favorite place to play MTG, Warhammer, D&D, Pokemon, and most recently The One Piece TCG. The owners are very friendly and albeit a bit strange, (In a good way of course haha). I believe they have made one of if not the best hobby shops in NC. They will always have my business and time for any of their fun events that come up. To all the staff and owners of The Mighty Meeple i thank you for bringing such a great experience and alot of fun memories from day one and beyond! ❤

When I moved to Charlotte this was the first LGS I went to, and for a few weeks, it was okay. One day I came in for an event with my boyfriend and was discriminated against by the owner and his mother for being LGBT. I was told I could not have the product I paid for and asked to leave, no reason given. I went back a few weeks later to pick up an online order I had placed 30 minutes before closing (and it was a one card order) and the owner’s mother again discriminated against me by locking the door once seeing my boyfriend get out of the car as well. Not only have I been shown disgusting behavior towards me personally but the store price gouges like no other I have ever seen on TCG single buying and selling. On top of this the recent Disney Lorcana release that was supposed to be released to the public, the store took the inventory they got, opened up boxes, and are reselling some of the singles for almost 500% of their TCG Player market price. They’re stopping me from enjoying my hobbies and everyone from getting a chance to play Lorcana and get their hands on cards without paying an arm and a leg. And before you think anything else, plenty of stores are selling the products at the correct pricing and still making profit. This store is just filled with greedy, rude, and homophobic staff, it’s 2023, it’s disgusting…
Very helpful and friendly staff, it was busy but I still felt like I was being taken care of.
Nice staff. Nice inventory

Had a great experience at this store! The owner is super friendly and the building is one of the absolute nicest LGS I have ever been to they have a huge supply for every one of the major hobbies including Magic, Pokemon, Warhammer, D&D, mini painting, and many more. The employees are super helpful and friendly as well and they have beer and other beverages for those who are interested in that. Definitely an amazing stop and worth the drive and the stop on a long road trip!
Huge store with a fine selection
They stopped selling disc golf stuff unfortunately I was stopping by to get a putter they had a decent selection idk why they got rid of it
We love this place!

I’m a Pokémon based YouTuber and I was really surprised when I saw their selection. Fantastic cards from all eras and very good pricing. What’s more is they buy bulk which gives collectors a chance to exchange worthless cards for some credit towards cards they might not otherwise have bought! Really enjoyed my experience !

Very cool shop with tons of play space, concessions, and an awesome MTG and tabletop game selection. Staff has always been super helpful as well every time I’ve been here. Highly recommend visiting if you’re looking for a tabletop gaming home base.

Absolutely adore this store. We go in about once a month, maybe twice, and feel like kids in a toy store. There is so much to offer for any kind of game you might want. From cards to table top to fun family game nights. As well as accessories and toys!
One of the best card stores in Charlotte for sure. Friendly knowledgeable staff! Go Mighty Meeps!
Nice selection of games, dice and all your hobby needs. Super friendly staff

I travel a lot for work, and get to visit a lot of game stores. Granted I've only been to this one once, but very good first impression. Greeted when walking through the door but then left alone to browse, just the way I like it. Good selection (Best in store Bolt Action selection I've seen), and huge play area with what I assume is evening beer service. Good prices. Recommended.
Really chill vibe. Alcohol and snacks while you are playing games, and a good selection of products.
I enjoy every visit but live rather far away, but if you live in the Concord area, give the place a try.
Great selection of Magic cards, games and accessories! It's my favorite place to shop for gaming gear! Very friendly and helpful staff too! We drive about 2 hours to come here. Definitely worth it!
Plenty of great people and a huge inventory selection. Great for events
Although I had never been to the store I called to ask some questions and Chad answered the phone and was one of the most helpful people I have ever dealt with.

Such wonderful staff and owners here at the Mighty Meeple. I got to attend the pre release back in February and when my friends and I wanted to do a draft at home. We realized we didn't have enough lands they graciously let us borrow a bunch for the event. Again extremely amazing group here. Will continue to go here and support this establishment

The Mighty Meeple is awesome! A must for all your gaming needs ! Recently checked it out for the Phyrexia pre release after not playing magic for awhile. Everyone there was welcoming and such a fun environment! Staff was great! I look forward to attending more events and getting all my supplies there. I would recommend this place whether you are just getting into card/board games or if you have been enjoying them for years !

Love coming here for adventure league dnd and Friday night magic. Employees are amazing, always very friendly. They have a section in the back for activities aka dnd, magic, pokemon and alot other things. In there they have a small food/drink area where you can buy beer off the tap (about 6 different kinds, might be more) or Gatorade, soda, juice, crackers, chips, bakery goods and alot other's.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for your review Alexander! We are so glad that you enjoy The Mighty Meeple!

reviews_data.review_text: Great store and layout, loved the selection of games and paints.  Want to come back and play some board games soon!
Nice selection. Prices a little high
Fantastic place.  Has a huge game room and the staff is wonderful.

Love it.  Everyone is really nice and inviting. Great vibes all around and a fantastic collection of merchandise to purchase at pretty reasonable prices plus other cool more expensive things if you like to splurge. So
Many. Dice. All the dice. Dice made of metal, wood, gem stones! Amd of course regular normal dice sections. Highly recommend 👌
My partner and I come all the time. We love it here and are so glad we get to support this business.

Customer service has gone way down in the past few years.  This used to be one of my favorite places to play, but it takes a very long time to get service.  Also, forcing customers to use the single computer to purchase singles is not the way to go.  MTG singles are almost always in stock, but the prices are very high.
Great selection of games and products and a lot of room to play
An excellent source for several types of gaming(cards, miniatures, D&D, etc). The people are well versed and the products are a fair(and sometimes better) price compared to other places.
Great place, huge selection of games, open box play to test before you buy, and a great selection of local taps.
Very large selection of games and miniatures.
Elves and dragons and paints oh my!!! Clean store with friendly staff who seem very knowledgeable. Great miniature paint selection and a cool clearance section with some good deals.
Great place to play, nice online selection, friendly staff.
Pretty neat store. The game area is the best I've ever seen; it has an actual bar for beer and snacks.
Great local game store
It's okay, lots of people come here.  If you like magic the gathering, you can fulfill that addiction adequately here.
Great selection of board games and more! Perfect for the omni gamer.

First time coming here- and now its my FAVORITE local game store. Awesome diverse selection, knowledgeable staff with great recommendations!!  And seriously- the selection. I was super impressed of not only the brand new games that they had in stock (Marvel Dice Throne, Ark Nova) but also the selection of lesser knowns (Tiny Epic series). And the expansions- all the expansions. I also got a great recommendation for teaching my kid simple mechanics and an easy learn to a phenomenal game (Tsuro). Very impressed. Will definitely be back.  *high five*
Great place to sell your MTG cards

Awesome place to pick up new board and card games. The staff is really friendly and helpful. I've only been there twice but everyone I met has been very nice and the place seems to have a good family environment as well. Great place to play Magic the Gathering if you are into it as well as D&D and many other games!

The Mightiest of all the Meeples!

Update:  Still the Mightiest
My son and grandson had a great time playing Pokemon me not so much
Great store for all your gaming needs plus some super nice folks who run and own the store.
Always clean and well kept and a great environment for whatever your tabletop gaming niche may be
This place is super great. Great selection of board games, really helpful staff.

This place is always packed with people, products, and events. There's something for everyone here, but what I appreciate most is the sophisticated organization of buying and selling Magic cards with the Mighty Meeple. Everyone is super friendly and informative, and they even have snacks and alcoholic beverages for your next game night or campaign.

Store is clean and service is consistent, prices are slightly higher than TCG average and they won't take anything above light play unless you open in store. This can be problematic if you have reserve list cards. Overall a good store.

Awesome spot for fans of MtG and Pokemon TCG. Massive playing table setup in the back and 99% of the staff is very friendly and helpful.
Plenty of game dice/pieces, frisbee golf and playing mats to choose from. I recommend highly to anyone looking for a new one stop shop  for most TCG needs

Everyone that works here is super kind and accommodating. They make an effort to learn your name, answer questions, look up stock, or share their game knowledge. They will not hesitate to do a special order for you. They have an amazing selection of MTG cards, both in pack form or singles. They have a huge selection of board games, and they have several of them open in the game room for you to try out before you buy. Their game room is huge with SO many tables. Even on a crowded weekend evening, I've never struggled to find a place to sit. You can show up for events on their calendar, or anytime for casual play with friends. They serve draft beer, sodas, snacks, and local baked goods. I really like this place!

Great gaming store.  Wide selection of games and a large gaming room.  Layout is great too.  Signing up for their membership (which is free) offers points that can be redeemed for discounts.  The best gaming store in Charlotte.

The ultimate hobby store - massive, well lit spaces with knowledgeable staff and enormous resources.
Warhammer, Marvel Crisis Protocol, MTG, Legion, Board Games? Of course they have the standards.
Tournament play, open play and casual play? Absolutely!
But for fun bonuses - they have an amazing beer and wine selection, an epic disc golf selection, some less known but great games like malifaux and bolt action, and merch to boot.
There is no game store like this. Go!
Super nice/helpful employees and huge miniature selection and paints.
Excellent stock and knowledgeable staff.

I always enjoy coming in here, even though I'm not hardcore into cards or tabletop anything. The staff are always pleasant, the atmosphere softly buzzing, with a jazzy selection of games and dice - and don't forget plushies. Their refreshments include some unique local brews (Red Clay, anyone?) and they are well priced. 10/10 for space, variety, and ambiance!
Went to get dice, they had a lot of dice!

Tried to call in and ask a question and was responded with some rude kid. When asked a simple question he could not answer me and get so frustrated he hung up. There are other options in town and I would go there.
reviews_data.owner_answer: I'm really sorry for the experience you had. We appreciate your feedback and we will handle this situation.

reviews_data.review_text: Amazing place! Big space with lots of room to browse their extensive stock. Something here for all types of gamers and miniature painters. I was excited to find they had the full lines of GW, Vallejo and Army Painter paints! The staff was also very friendly and attentive. Definitely check them out!

I went into Mighty Meeple looking for some Pokémon cards. Ness was the biggest help I could have ever asked for. I found exactly what I was looking for and she went the extra mile to help me out. Great place with an amazing selection of cards. I will be coming back for sure!
Great gaming place.
Great place! This place is HUGE! They have all your board game and d&d stuff you could ever need! They even have disc golf

Love MM. Looks even better after the renovation. Stock is pretty great and they are clearly open to trying new games as Malifaux and Bolt Action both seem to have escalated there. Always worth the trip and with a pretty good burger place right across the street from them.
Inventory was not great but did have a large selection of different types of games. Prices were the same or better on Amazon sadly. Staff was friendly and store was well organized.
Our go-to spot for gaming.

EDITED TO ADD: While I was VERY upset by the incident in my original review, I thoroughly enjoy collecting and playing Magic The Gathering, especially with my two oldest kiddos, and refused to let one incident ruin it for me. I proceeded to visit a few more times over the course of a week trading in cards and purchasing the ones I needed for the MANY Commander decks I'm building. I was quite pleasantly surprised during my most recent visit the other day to learn that I've purchased enough that I was rewarded with store credit, which really helped me with my deck building. I still think that night one of the employees could have spared a couple minutes to sell one card, especially since they had a backroom completely full of players and 15 minutes left, but so far I like the store and am glad I discovered it so quickly after moving here. So I'm updating the stars for my review.

Original review:
There was ABSOLUTELY NO EXCUSE for not taking a couple of minutes to sell ONE card when there were TWO employees there, still FIFTEEN MINUTES until closing, AND the back room was FULL of people still playing!!! ONE of the two employees COULD have taken a couple minutes to sell ONE card while the other continued sweeping while the back room was FULL of people still playing!!! IF I had arrived with only 5 minutes to closing AND the back room was EMPTY instead of FULL of players, THEN it would have been understandable to say come back tomorrow or order online, but NOT when there was still FIFTEEN MINUTES LEFT AND A BACK ROOM COMPLETELY FULL OF PEOPLE STILL PLAYING THEIR GAMES!!!!! That was absolute BS!!!! Such a disappointment for the ONLY Magic The Gathering card shop in the area.
I have built  all my my decks from this store and everyone is and was so helpfull i highly  recommend  this place for all of your mtg singles

I enjoy going to this store to look for D & D miniatures! The location is close to my house so it's super easy to visit and look for new miniatures for my adventuring needs! I also restock paints and paint supplies for my miniatures. The selection is very good. I wish they had Game Colors by Vallejo but so far I can't find a store that does!
Greta store lots of selection and snack/drinks on site for long gaming sessions.

Better selection and generally equal to or better prices than the other game stores anywhere nearby. All of the employees were exceptionally nice and helpful. This place is the best game store I've found anywhere in or near Charlotte.
Very polite staff and clean store

Mighty meeple is vary nice place to play and the staff is knowledgeable on most games  and pleasant to be around If they do not have stuff they can special order . Lots of snacks and beer added to menu
Really Good people
Cool selection of table top games
Great place for Magic the Gathering, the owner is very pleasant.
Great people always willing to help. The much larger gaming area and store area are amazing

They have a fairly generous selection of just about everything. The game room in the back is pretty cool, although I have not had the chance to play any matches here yet. The staff and managers are very friendly as well.
Was a pleasure playing in the 2k tournament this past Saturday. Great shop. Excellent employees.

Great selection of games to browse, as well as dice... and Frisbee golf disks.  There is a large room to try out games (they have events but I haven't attended any) and purchase drinks and snacks.  The staff have been kind and helpful.

Today I went to the mighty meeple to finish my King Ghidorah deck. The man at the front was very helpful. But after he helped me a lot with my deck I had a chance to talk to the owner of the store. And he asked me why did I leave a one star. I explained to him that one of his staff members was aggravating the s*** out of me. And was gonna cause me to jump over a counter top. He was very courteous and listening to what I had to say and he expressed that he was going to do his best to fix this problem so it doesn't persist. I'm going to give this place four stars instead of one, merely because the guy who was at the front and the manager and other staff member who spoke to me.

But the future will tell.
Great place to game! Lots of tables and terrain to use, great staff too!
Store was so awesome, great selection of products and the staff was very friendly and helpful. 10/10 would reccomend
The Mighty Meeple is the premier gaming location in the region.  The selection is vast.  The playing area is full of people but never crowded.  They demo games and have excellent giveaways.
Every one was so nice, friendly & helpful. What a great place to buy & play games.

Sweet lil shop, has alot of play space and tables. Not a fan of having to type into a computer to buy a card though. When dealing with TCGs or any collectables it should be more personable imo. When you want to buy a card you should just be able to point and say "I want that one." Not, ok well you have to put it in the computer and then bring me a piece of paper. Like, no, thats your employees job, not the customers.
Great selection of board games.

I went in to buy my daughters Pokémon cards but had no idea what I was doing. The workers were helpful, patient and explained things clearly. They have evening meetups that change throughout the week. This is a great place to buy board games.

Nice, large, clean store with a big selection of games, gaming supplies, and trading cards. Staff is very friendly and helpful, and it looks like they have a large gaming space in the back for tournaments. Will definitely be coming back.
Great place.   Spend entirely too much time here.   Nice place to play games
Love this store, they had every card I was looking for and they were really nice and minimally mansplainy
Wide selection and knowledgeable employees. Decent pricing too.
Awesome place for all things nerd.  The mini bar and gaming area are top notch and the staff is great.
